braf_related_treatments.name: Encorafenib (Braftovi)
braf_related_treatments.mechanism: Selectively inhibits BRAF V600E kinase activity
braf_related_treatments.efficacy: Median OS of 9.3 months as monotherapy

braf_related_treatments.name: Cetuximab (Erbitux)
braf_related_treatments.mechanism: Binds to EGFR and blocks ligand binding
braf_related_treatments.efficacy: Objective response rate of 26.8% when combined with encorafenib

braf_related_treatments.name: Binimetinib (Mektovi)
braf_related_treatments.mechanism: Inhibits MEK1 and MEK2 activation and kinase activity
braf_related_treatments.efficacy: Marginal additional benefit when added to encorafenib and cetuximab
